name: DENTAL_PROBEDEPTH_HX
description: This table contains the historical values for periodontal documentation on a tooth.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the tooth record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_TOOTH_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple probing depth readings associated with the tooth and the historical instant from the DENTAL_TOOTH_HX table

columns.name: DENTAL_PROBEDPTH_HX
columns.description: This column tracks the history of probing depths (in mm) on a particular tooth.
